Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 16 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Rock, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 60/180ft, Average Damage: 28 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Treant makes 2 Slam attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Animate Trees, The Treant magically animates trees around it, typically to slam trespassers in its forests

Abilities.Ability 1: False Appearance, While the Treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree
Abilities.Ability 2: Siege Monster, The Treant deals double damage to objects and structures
